title: sadAshiva hrdaya nivAsini
sahitya:
sadA shiva hrudaya nivAsini! sat
cidAnanda cinmaya rUpiNi ambA 

anupallavi

vEdAgama shAstra sampUraNi- nI
pAdAra vindamu sEvimpa jEsina 

caraNam

sarasAngi sarva jana rakshaki!
paramAnandakara bruhannAyaki!
niratamu nI pAdamu sadA nammiti
kara kamalAdhari! kAruNya sAgari!

madhyama kAlam

sarigA mA moralani vina nI
sari evvaru lErani brOvavE talli
